description:
Head to the backcountry with confidence, this package has the essentials for travel in avalanche terrain. The package includes the Barryvox Transceiver, 280 Speed Probe and Alugator Ride SE Shovel. The Barryvox is an easy-to-read display and clear symbols, and the probe and shovel pack down small for stowing in your bag.

  • Transceiver is powerful and simple to use with gloves on
  • Automatic self-test, frequency check and function test ensures your beacon is always functioning properly
  • 70m search strips speeds signal pick-up
  • Buried beacons can be marked to speed up searching in multiple-burial scenarios
  • Includes carrying system
  • Probe uses glove-compatible Speed Lock system for quick deployment
  • Safety marking at 150cm acts as a visual guide
  • Shovel blade and shaft are hardened aluminum, handle is plastic
name: Mammut Barryvox Tour Package
